website_summaries.verdict: Disperses calming scents throughout the room to help reduce anxiety for one or more pets.
pros: A room diffuser that disperses calming essential oils to take the edge off a dog’s anxiety
Lasts for a month or longer without needing to refill
Works best in conjunction with other anti-anxiety treatments
cons: Gives off a slightly unpleasant odor, most likely the valerian oil component

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter came back home and with our granddaughter and two labs in tow. We already had one stubborn lab of our own that had shown not to be much of a dog's dog. We were challenged with getting all three of these dogs co-existing in the same house. Three weeks later we are at a point where they don't even have to be separated, they are eating together and drinking out of the same water bowls. I believe this plug-in was a big help in the process. For a household that now has 3 dogs that originally didn't get along, we know have a calm, happy home.
customer_reviews.author: JWood

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to help decrease the aggressiveness of one of my cats who tends to bully my other cat. You can definitely smell the scent once you plug it in. Unfortunately, I didn't see any change in behaviors. I ended up unplugging the diffuser after 3 weeks or so because my cat started sneezing and I wanted to make sure she wasn't allergic to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the Pet Remedy De-Stress plug in for a few weeks now, and we've seen a remarkable difference in our 16-year-old cat. We just moved, and she was super stressed, but now she is much calmer and has stopped spraying/marking around the house. I didn't give it five stars only because I don't know how long it will last based on the recommended times.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Helps but stinks
customer_reviews.text: Oh it definitely smells funky. Everyone in the house recognizes it. The vet recommended it because our cat kept peeing on places outside of her litter box. Claims our other cat was stressing the other one out. Cat hasn’t stopped peeing here and there, but she has come out her covered bed more often. So the aroma seems to help with her anxiety. It’s been over 2 weeks and you can still smell that stuff. It’s like a grandma’s house.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They Help
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and does seem to help. I can smell the valerian. I rescued a feral and a semi feral cat. They each were quite stressed coming indoor. Nothing is 100% when rehabilitating cats, but they do calm down - at least they stop nonstop caterwauling. The oil and diffuser were also wrapped very nicely that when I opened it I kind of felt I was opening a gift. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Queen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for my bunnies...
customer_reviews.text: I have plugged this diffuser in for 3 days and there’s no sign that it is working. My newly bonded bunnies all in a sudden started fighting recently. They are okay with and even groom each other most of the day. However, they will start chasing, and if we don’t intervene, break into fights several times a day. I was hoping that this diffuser will help them calm down but it is not doing anything. On top of that, the scent smells pretty nasty, like sour milk or cheese. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Travelbug

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I just wana day my vet told me about these and I got 3- for each room and I have already seen a improvement in my cat- I have 6 cats but 1 of them never wants to come around but these plug in help.
customer_reviews.author: D.W. D.

customer_reviews.title: Please observe your animal's behavior after this is plugged in....
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats. This seemed to work fine for 2 of them. However, I did notice that within a day or 2 of plugging this in, 1 of the 3 cats become very, very lethargic and lost his appetite. Just like people, I believe things affect cats differently; unfortunately for one of my furry children, this seemed to make him ill. However, after removing it, he was back to himself within a couple of hours. I didn't notice a smell at all BTW. I would caution buyers to avoid assuming an item is safe for your animal simply because it is natural and to watch your animal's behavior after this is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: It Really has Worked !!
customer_reviews.text: The pet remedy has worked wonderfully for my Cairn terrier .This has calmed him down a lot .It has curbed his over excitable barking , and his nervous Nature .It has let him calm down .Though it only helped a little with his need to Mark in the house .I use to buy comfort zone .This one works better .I hope this helps some one . Good Luck !
customer_reviews.author: Kerryman754

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I received a dud or not. There is literally no smell. I was completely expecting something strong when I plugged it in after all that I read. However there is nothing. Also my cats seem completely unaffected by it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rinker

customer_reviews.title: This works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My very shy girl who hasn’t let me pet her in weeks is lying on the bed with me. I bought some other things but this is the one that is consistent. My other kitties seem happier as well. I’m sold.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell Very good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to tell if these products help or not. The only thing I didn’t like about this one is the smell. Unfortunately, the best place to put this for our cat is our bedroom, but my husband kept saying, “Ugh, what is that smell?!?”
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: This works and is a great value
customer_reviews.text: This product line was recommended by my veterinarian. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R

customer_reviews.title: Strange odor
customer_reviews.text: Don’t really know if it’s working. Has a very strange odor
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: Worked great my cat instantly relaxed after a cross country move
customer_reviews.author: heather Feather

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not stop my cats from spraying. They are neutered but territorial.
customer_reviews.author: Monday'sChild

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say it work but it didn’t do a thing. Did nothing to calm my boxer even a little.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Product works
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work, however it does have a slight unpleasant odor. I will go back to buying a different product without the odor
customer_reviews.author: Drouleau

customer_reviews.title: dreamy
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the big brands. I will be switching all 5 of my other diffusers to this brand as they run out.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Instant use
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My car instantly liked my boyfriends after previously having anxiety attacks
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke, doesn’t smell great, and did not help my dog at all.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay burmingham

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I use a lot of herbal remedies and I thought this might help my new cat Teddy. Teddy is not doing well with the other 5 cats I have. He thinks they are all his enemies and can't seem to make any friends among them because he constantly attacks them. I'm giving your product 4 stars because I like the nice scent it puts in the house but it hasn't helped to calm Teddy. I won't say it won't work for other cats and pets because my other 5 cats love to go over to the dispenser and smell it so it must work for them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because I can't guarantee if it truly works or not. We have it plugged up in our living room which is where our puppy typically stays. While I don't care for the smell, it isn't awful.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Need more
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work as well as I expected. Probably need more than one in my house.
customer_reviews.author: RP

product_meta.title: Pet Remedy Natural Calming Plug-in Diffuser | Dog Anxiety Relief and Cat Calming Product | Relieves Dog and Cat Separation Anxiety, Stress from Fireworks, House Moves, Companion Loss & More |
feature_bullets: INSTANT RELIEF FOR YOUR PET from stress symptoms: aggression, behaviour change, spraying / soiling, over-grooming, lack of interaction, pacing, loss of appetite, chewing, scratching or excessive yawning.

PET REMEDY 100% NATURAL cat and dog diffuser offers natural dog anxiety relief and cat calming when they’re anxious, stressed by fireworks, change of routine, hyperactivity, travel, vet or groomer visits. It activates their natural calming mechanisms.

100% NATURAL INGREDIENTS in Pet Remedy cat and dog calming products instantly calm any anxious cat, dog or other pet disturbed by loud noises, the loss of a companion, change in routine or being home alone.
VET-APPROVED AND RECOMMENDED Pet Remedy’s clinically proven products are a highly effective, natural alternative to synthetic pheromone anti-stress treatments for dogs and cats.
NO SYNTHETIC PHEROMONES - Gentle essential oils mimic a natural calm-inducing amino acid - GABA (gamma amino butyric acid), present in all mammals, reptiles and birds.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
